com.exlibris.digitool.common.dnx

Class DnxDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.exlibris.digitool.common.dnx.DnxDocument
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DnxDocument
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    DnxDocument defines a layer above org.dom4j.Document for accessing a DNX document

    Author:
    Tsachm
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEvent(com.exlibris.repository.persistence.HDeProvenance pEvent) 
      void correctForFILE()
      Correct the DNX document by
      1) Assigning all FILE mandatory sections defined by the profile
      2) Correcting all section keys according to the correction routines defined by the profile
      void correctForIE()
      Correct the DNX document by
      1) Assigning all IE mandatory sections defined by the profile
      2) Correcting all section keys according to the correction routines defined by the profile
      void correctForREP()
      Correct the DNX document by
      1) Assigning all REP mandatory sections defined by the profile
      2) Correcting all section keys according to the correction routines defined by the profile
      DnxSection createSection(java.lang.String sectionId)
      Creates a new section in the DNX document with the ID provided by sectionId
      The operation adds a new section to the underlying org.dom4j.Document
      and to the arrayList of existing DnxSection objects.
      void deleteSection(java.lang.String sectionId) 
      DnxDocument getDnxDocumentForDigiprovMd()
      Generates a new DNX document from to the existing document with sections relevant to the DigiprovMd, according to the assigned profile.
      Note: Updates to the derived document will not affect the original document
      DnxDocument getDnxDocumentForRightshMd()
      Generates a new DNX document from the existing document with sections relevant to the RightshMd, according to the assigned profile.
      Note: Updates to the derived document will not affect the original document
      DnxDocument getDnxDocumentForSourceMd()
      Generates a new DNX document from the existing document with sections relevant to the SourceMd, according to the assigned profile.
      Note: Updates to the derived document will not affect the original document
      DnxDocument getDnxDocumentForTechMd()
      Generates a new DNX document from the existing document with sections relevant to the TechMd, according to the assigned profile.
      Note: Updates to the derived document will not affect the original document

      On the first run, CREATIONDATE == CHECKDATE and FIXITYVALUE==CHECKRESULT.

      • validateForIE

        public java.util.List<com.exlibris.digitool.common.dnx.DnxErrorReport> validateForIE()
        Validates the DNX document as a DNX for PREMIS object of type "IE" and the assigned profile.
        Returns:
        An array of DnxErrorReport objects. Each DnxErrorReport holds a reference to the problematic DNX element with the error description

      • validateForRep

        public java.util.List<com.exlibris.digitool.common.dnx.DnxErrorReport> validateForRep()
        Validates the DNX document as a DNX for PREMIS object of type "REP" and the assigned profile.
        Returns:
        An array of DnxErrorReport objects. Each DnxErrorReport holds a reference to the problematic DNX element with the error description

        1) Assigning all IE mandatory sections defined by the profile

      • createSection

        public DnxSection createSection(java.lang.String sectionId)
        Creates a new section in the DNX document with the ID provided by sectionId
        The operation adds a new section to the underlying org.dom4j.Document
        and to the arrayList of existing DnxSection objects. For example:
        DnxSection newDnxSection = dnxDocument.createSection(DNXConstants.CONTROL.sectionId);
        Parameters:
        sectionId - The identifier of the section
        Returns:
        The newly created DnxSection object

      • deleteSection

        public void deleteSection(java.lang.String sectionId)

        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • getSectionsList

        public java.util.List<DnxSection> getSectionsList()
        Returns:
        returns the list of sections the document holds as a list of DnxSection objects

      • getSectionById

        public DnxSection getSectionById(java.lang.String sectionId)
        Returns a DNXSection matching the given identifier
        Parameters:
        sectionId - section identifier
        Returns:
        Existing DNXSection object with the given identifier or null if no such section exists.

      • getSectionKeyValue

        public java.lang.String getSectionKeyValue(DNXConstants.SectionKey sectionKey)
        Returns the value of the given sectionKey as a string.
        Parameters:
        sectionKey - an object containing the section identifier and key identifier.
        Returns:
        value of the given sectionKey as a string or null if no such section/key exists

      • getSectionKeyValue

        public java.lang.String getSectionKeyValue(java.lang.String sectionId,
                                           java.lang.String sectionKeyId)
        Returns the value of the given section and section key as a String.
        Parameters:
        sectionId - the section identifier
        sectionKeyId - the section key identifier
        Returns:
        value of the given sectionKey as a string or null if no such section/key exists

      • updateSectionKey

        public void updateSectionKey(DNXConstants.SectionKey sectionKey,
                             java.lang.String value)
        Updates or creates a section key value.
        Note:
        1) The method create a section with the given section identifier if no such section exists.
        2) The method creates a key by the given key identifier if no such key exists.
        3) The method assumes the first occurrence of a section record.

        Parameters:
        sectionKey - an object containing the section identifier and key identifier.
        value - The new string value of the key, replacing the old string value

      • updateSectionKey

        public void updateSectionKey(java.lang.String sectionId,
                             java.lang.String keyId,
                             java.lang.String value)
        Updates or creates a section key value.
        Note:
        1) The method creates a section with the given section identifier if no such section exists.
        2) The method creates a key by the given key identifier if no such key exists.
        3) The method assumes the first occurrence of a section record.

        Parameters:
        sectionId - the section identifier
        keyId - the section key identifier
        value - The new string value of the key, replacing the old string value

      • getDnxDocumentForTechMd

        public DnxDocument getDnxDocumentForTechMd()
        Generates a new DNX document from the existing document with sections relevant to the TechMd, according to the assigned profile.
        Note: Updates to the derived document will not affect the original document
        Returns:
        The newly created DNX document containing only sections relevant to TechMd

      • getDnxDocumentForDigiprovMd

        public DnxDocument getDnxDocumentForDigiprovMd()
        Generates a new DNX document from to the existing document with sections relevant to the DigiprovMd, according to the assigned profile.
        Note: Updates to the derived document will not affect the original document
        Returns:
        The newly created DNX document containing only sections relevant to DigiprovMd

      • getDnxDocumentForRightshMd

        public DnxDocument getDnxDocumentForRightshMd()
        Generates a new DNX document from the existing document with sections relevant to the RightshMd, according to the assigned profile.
        Note: Updates to the derived document will not affect the original document
        Returns:
        The newly created DNX document containing only sections relevant to RightshMd

      • getDnxDocumentForSourceMd

        public DnxDocument getDnxDocumentForSourceMd()
        Generates a new DNX document from the existing document with sections relevant to the SourceMd, according to the assigned profile.
        Note: Updates to the derived document will not affect the original document
        Returns:
        The newly created DNX document containing only sections relevant to SourceMd

      • getProfile

        public DNXProfile getProfile()
        Gets the DNX profile.
        Usually the profile is set by the DnxDocumentFactory, with the default dnx_profile.xml file found by the Class Loader.
        Returns:
        Returns the assigned DNXProfile

      • setProfile

        public void setProfile(DNXProfile profile)
        Gets the DNX profile.
        Usually, the profile is set by the DnxDocumentFactory, with the default dnx_profile.xml file found by the Class Loader.
        Parameters:
        profile - The DNX profile according to which the document should work

      • mergeDnxDocuments

        public void mergeDnxDocuments(DnxDocument dnxRecordForTechMd,
                              DnxDocument dnxRecordForDigiprovMd,
                              DnxDocument dnxRecordForRightshMd,
                              DnxDocument dnxRecordForSourceMd)
        Merges all three DNX documents into the current one.
        After the merge, the original documents will not be affected by the operation performed on the current document.
        Usually this merge occurs when constructing one single DNX document from the METS adm's three sections.
        Parameters:
        dnxRecordForTechMd - Dnx document containing sections relevant for TechMd
        dnxRecordForDigiprovMd - DNX document containing sections relevant for DigiprovMd
        dnxRecordForRightshMd - DNX document containing sections relevant for RightshMd
        dnxRecordForSourceMd - DNX document containing sections relevant for SourceMd

      • mergeDnxDocument

        public void mergeDnxDocument(DnxDocument dnxRecord)
        Merges the given DNX document into the current object by cloning each section (together with its records and record keys) into the current object.
        Parameters:
        dnxRecord - The document containing all sections to clone and merge

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • setFileFixity

        public void setFileFixity(java.lang.String fixityAgent,
                          java.lang.String fixityType,
                          java.lang.String fixityValue)
                   throws com.exlibris.digitool.exceptions.DigitoolException
        Creates/updates the DnxSectionRecord for the given fixityType in the DNXConstants.FILEFIXITY section
        On the first run, CREATIONDATE == CHECKDATE and FIXITYVALUE==CHECKRESULT. On subsequent runs, CHECKDATE and CHECKRESULT ONLY are updated
        Parameters:
        fixityAgent - the package name and version of the fixityType implementation
        fixityType - MD5, SHA1, or CRC32
        fixityValue - checksum hash value
        Throws:
        com.exlibris.digitool.exceptions.DigitoolException

      • getFileFixityTypes

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFileFixityTypes()

        public void getFileFixityByType(java.lang.String fixityType,
                                java.lang.StringBuffer fixityValue)
        Enter values of the given FILEFIXITY.FIXITYTYPE(for example, agent, value, etc.)
